CWEs: CWE-89: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection')
description: The function 'unique_name_618' is vulnerable to SQL Injection. The function constructs an SQL query by concatenating user-supplied input (the 'object' parameter) into the query. An attacker could potentially manipulate the 'object' parameter to alter the SQL query, leading to unauthorized access or data manipulation.
